languages.text: "Старость, ум помутнился, ага, иначе не объяснишь. Очень уж это было нечестно. Я с ним десять лет летал, и ничего за это не получить?"
"Old age, you know, his head wasn't the same anymore... Yeah, that's got to be it. It was just too unfair. To fly with him for ten years and then get nothing for it?"
languages.original_text: "Старость, ум помутнился, ага, иначе не объяснишь. Очень уж это было нечестно. Я с ним десять лет летал, и ничего за это не получить?"

traits.locale_text: "Old age, you know, his head wasn't the same anymore... yes, that's got to be it. It was just too unfair. To fly with him for ten years and then get nothing for it?"
"Old age, you know, his head wasn't the same anymore... yes, that's got to be it. It was just too unfair. To fly with him for ten years and then get nothing for it?"
"Old age, you know, his head wasn't the same anymore... Yeah, that's got to be it. It was just too unfair. To fly with him for ten years and then get nothing for it?"
"Old age, you know, his head wasn't the same anymore... Yeah, that's got to be it. It was just too unfair. To fly with him for ten years and then get nothing for it?"
"Old age, you know, his head wasn't the same anymore... Yeah, that's got to be it. It was just too unfair. To fly with him for ten years and then get nothing for it?"

languages.text: “你也知道，人老了，脑子就糊涂了……是啊，肯定就是这样。这实在是太不公平了。我和他一起到处闯荡了十年，到最后却一个子儿都得不到？”
languages.original_text: "Old age, you know, his head wasn't the same anymore... Yeah, that's got to be it. It was just too unfair. To fly with him for ten years and then get nothing for it?"

traits.locale_text: “你也知道，人老了，脑子就糊涂了……是啊，肯定就是这样。这实在是太不公平了。我和他一起到处闯荡了十年，到最后却一个子儿都得不到？”

languages.text: «La edad, ya sabe, se le había ido la cabeza... Sí, ha tenido que ser eso. Es que es muy injusto. ¿Volar con él durante diez años y no llevarme ni una triste joya?».
languages.original_text: "Old age, you know, his head wasn't the same anymore... Yeah, that's got to be it. It was just too unfair. To fly with him for ten years and then get nothing for it?"

traits.locale_text: «La edad, ya sabe, se le había ido la cabeza... Sí, ha tenido que ser eso. Es que es muy injusto. ¿Volar con él durante diez años y no llevarme ni una triste joya?».

languages.text: 「年のせいだろうな、もうまともに考えることもできていなかったし…きっとボケたんだろう。あまりに酷い話だろ。あいつと10年も航海してきたのに、びた一文残してくれないんだぞ？」
languages.original_text: "Old age, you know, his head wasn't the same anymore... Yeah, that's got to be it. It was just too unfair. To fly with him for ten years and then get nothing for it?"

traits.locale_text: 「年のせいだろうな、もうまともに考えることもできていなかったし…きっとボケたんだろう。あまりに酷い話だろ。あいつと10年も航海してきたのに、びた一文残してくれないんだぞ？」

languages.text: "Bestimmt das Alter, er war nicht mehr ganz richtig im Kopf ... Ja, das muss es gewesen sein. Und das war einfach ungerecht. Zehn Jahre mit ihm zu fliegen und dann nichts dafür zu kriegen?"
languages.original_text: "Old age, you know, his head wasn't the same anymore... Yeah, that's got to be it. It was just too unfair. To fly with him for ten years and then get nothing for it?"

traits.locale_text: "Bestimmt das Alter, er war nicht mehr ganz richtig im Kopf ... Ja, das muss es gewesen sein. Und das war einfach ungerecht. Zehn Jahre mit ihm zu fliegen und dann nichts dafür zu kriegen?"

languages.text: « Il se faisait vieux, vous savez, il n'avait plus toute sa tête... Oui, c'est tellement injuste que je ne vois pas d'autre explication. Dix ans, j'ai volé à ses côtés. Dix ans ! Et je n'ai droit à rien ? »
languages.original_text: "Old age, you know, his head wasn't the same anymore... Yeah, that's got to be it. It was just too unfair. To fly with him for ten years and then get nothing for it?"

traits.locale_text: « Il se faisait vieux, vous savez, il n'avait plus toute sa tête... Oui, c'est tellement injuste que je ne vois pas d'autre explication. Dix ans, j'ai volé à ses côtés. Dix ans ! Et je n'ai droit à rien ? »

languages.text: "Çok yaşlıydı. Aklı eskisi gibi değildi, gidip geliyordu. Herhâlde ondandır. Başka neden olsun? Onunla on yıl uç, can yoldaşı ol. Sonra avucunu yala. Adalet mi bu?"
languages.original_text: "Old age, you know, his head wasn't the same anymore... Yeah, that's got to be it. It was just too unfair. To fly with him for ten years and then get nothing for it?"

traits.locale_text: "Çok yaşlıydı. Artık eskisi gibi düşünemiyordu. O yüzden olmalı. Hiç adil bir durum değil. Onunla on yıl boyunca uçtuktan sonra karşılığında hiçbir şey alamayacak mıyım?"
